quote_text: Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.
People’s lives don’t end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.
Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something and has lost something.
If you don’t like your destiny, don’t accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
It’s more important to master the cards you’re holding than to complain about the ones your opponent was dealt.
Hard work is worthless for those that don’t believe in themselves.
The loneliest people are the kindest. The saddest people smile the brightest. The most damaged people are the wisest. All because they don’t wish to see anyone else suffer the way they did.
A person grows up when he’s able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.
A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.
People become stronger because they have memories they can’t forget.
If you can’t find a reason to fight, then you shouldn’t be fighting.
Human strength lies in the ability to change yourself.
If you can’t do something, then don’t. Focus on what you can do.
Sometimes I do feel like I’m a failure. Like there’s no hope for me. But even so, I’m not gonna give up. Ever!
Knowledge and awareness are vague, and perhaps better called illusions. Everyone lives within their own subjective interpretation.
You need to accept the fact that you’re not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.
Never trust anyone too much, remember the devil was once an angel
Thinking you’re no-good and worthless is the worst thing you can do.
I’ll leave tomorrow’s problems to tomorrow’s me.
Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of… Staying weak is!
Fools who don’t respect the past are likely to repeat it.
Moving on doesn’t mean you forget about things. It just means you have to accept what’s happened and continue living.
When people make a mistake, it is nice to give them advice, but… If they don’t listen, just leave them alone. Otherwise, you’ll do yourself a disservice by wasting your time and effort.
If you feel yourself hitting up against your limit, remember for what cause you clench your fists! Remember why you started down this path, and let that memory carry you beyond your limit.

Religion, ideology, resources, land, spite, love or just because… No matter how pathetic the reason, it’s enough to start war. War will never cease to exist… Reasons can be thought up after the fact… Human nature pursues strife.
Giving up kills people. When people reject giving up… They finally win the right to transcend humanity.
A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart.
I don’t care if no one likes me, I wasn’t created in this world to entertain everyone.
The world isn't perfect. But it's there for us, doing the best it can.... That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
Because people don't have wings, we look for ways to fly.
If you don’t share someone’s pain, you can never understand them.
Being lonely is more painful then getting hurt.
The world is cruel, but also very beautiful.
Reject common sense to make the impossible possible.

Who decides limits? And based on what? You said you worked hard? Well, maybe you need to work a little harder. Is that really the limit of your strength? Could you of tomorrow beat you today? Instead of giving in, move forward.
To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can't go back to happiness you could have.
Life and death are like light and shadow. They’re both always there. But people don’t like thinking about death, so subconsciously, they always look away from it.
Life is like a pencil that will surely run out, but will leave the beautiful writing of life.
When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back. It’s not like somebody’s gonna save you if you start babbling excuses.
As long as you laugh at people’s suffering, your goal will always be out of reach. If you never want to be defeated, you must first learn your own weakness, and always be kind.
How can you destroy a monster without becoming one?
Always believe in yourself. Do this and no matter where you are, you will have nothing to fear.
Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger, as well as kinder.
If you keep on hiding your true feelings, who is going to be happy? If you are sad, you should say it out loud!
Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.

You’ll only realize that you truly love someone if they already caused you enormous pain. Your enemies can never hurt you the way your loved ones can. It’s the people close to your heart that can give you the most piercing wound. Love is a double-edged sword, it can heal the wound faster or it can sink the blade even deeper.
Revenge is just the path you took to escape your suffering.
Life isn’t just doing things for yourself. It’s possible to live in such a way that other people’s happiness, makes you happy too.
Stop pitying yourself. Pity yourself, and life becomes an endless nightmare.
No matter how hard or impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal.
Helping other people is the best way to make up for your mistakes.
We shouldn’t blame ourselves for bad things that happened to us. Sometimes, no matter what we do, we are victims of the circumstances.
It will do no good to fight with hate in your heart.

When do you think people die? When they are shot through the heart by the bullet of a pistol? No. When they are ravaged by an incurable disease? No. When they drink a soup made from a poisonous mushroom? No! It’s when… They are forgotten.
You focus on the trivial, and lose sight of what is most important, change is impossible in this fog of ignorance.
If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future!
Do you always want to live hiding behind the mask you put up for the sake of others? You’re you, and there’s nothing wrong with that.
Man always thinks about the past before he dies, as if he were frantically searching for proof he truly lived.
Whether a fish lives in a clear stream or a water ditch, so long as it continues swimming forward, it will grow up beautifully.
I won’t forgive you. I won’t forget you yet, but I’m going to leave you and move on.
Fear is freedom! Subjugation is liberation! Contradiction is truth! Those are the facts of this world! And you will all surrender to them, you pigs in human clothing!
A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
Life is not a game of luck. If you wanna win, work hard.
It may be hard right now… But you must silence those thoughts! Stop counting only those things that you have lost! What is gone, is gone!
Words are like swords. If you use them the wrong way, they can turn into ugly weapons.
Stand up and walk. Keep moving forward. You’ve got two good legs. So get up and use them. You’re strong enough to make your own path.

If happiness had a form, what would it look like? It might be something like glass, because one doesn’t notice it normally. However, it is actually there … It will state it’s presence and existence more eloquently than any other thing in this world.
It's funny how each day you wake up and never really know if it will be one that will change your life forever.

Although I’m weak and full of flaws, I will never stop moving forward. No matter who I am, no one other than myself will create my own existence. No matter what others may think or feel, I will still move forward as myself.
People, who can’t throw something important away, can never hope to change anything.
Why should I apologize for being a monster? Has anyone ever apologized for turning me into one?
Everything has a beginning and an end. Life is just a cycle of starts and stops. There are ends we don’t desire, but they’re inevitable, we have to face them. It’s what being human is all about.
Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain.

We are all like fireworks: we climb, we shine and always go our separate ways and become further apart. But even when that time comes, let's not disappear like a firework and continue to shine... Forever.
There’s no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!
If you really want to be strong… Stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you!
Vision is not what your eyes see, but an image that your brain comprehends.
If you wanna stop this, then stand up! Because I’ve just got one thing to say to you! Never forget who you want to become!
If you want to know who you are, you have to look at your real self and acknowledge what you see.
However strong you become, never seek to bear everything alone. If you do, failure is certain.
Sometimes one must lose the battle in order to win the war.
Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal, but it has already left a scar.
You can die anytime, but living takes true courage.
It is at the moment of death that humanity has value.
I refuse to let my fear control me anymore.
If nobody cares to accept you and wants you in this world, accept yourself and you will see that you don’t need them and their selfish ideas.
You can’t win a game by doing nothing. And if someone else wins it for you then you haven’t accomplished anything. Life is the same way.
Destiny. Fate. Dreams. These unstoppable ideas are held deep in the heart of man. As long as there are people who seek freedom in this life, these things shall not vanish from the Earth.
Sometimes, we have to look beyond what we want and do what’s best.
Push through the pain, giving up hurts more.
It’s foolish to fear what we have yet to see and know.
A life without no changes can’t be called life. You can only call it experience.
People are all evil. In order to falsely believe yourself to be just, you must inevitably falsely believe that someone else is more evil than you.
Life is like a tube of toothpaste. When you’ve used all the toothpaste down to the last squeeze, that’s when you’ve really lived. Live with all your might, and struggle as long as you have life.
Don’t beg for things. Do it yourself, or else you won’t get anything.
We can’t waste time worrying about the what if’s.
No matter how many good deeds you perform, your past sins cannot be erased.
Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return.
Knowing you’re different is only the beginning. If you accept these differences, you’ll be able to get past them and grow even closer.
I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don’t know what exactly I’ll be able to do for you, but I’ll always be by your side.
Every journey begins with a single step. We just have to have patience.
Whatever you do, enjoy it to the fullest. That is the secret of life.
Sometimes it’s necessary to do unnecessary things.
Protecting someone means giving them a place to belong. Giving them a place where they can be happy.
When you lose sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart.
Don’t be so quick to throw away your life. No matter how disgraceful or embarrassing it may be, you need to keep struggling to find your way out until the very end.
Mistakes are not shackles that halt one from stepping forward. Rather, they are that which sustain and grow one’s heart.

If you begin to regret, you’ll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you. All that’s left for you then is to die. Nobody can foretell the outcome. Each decision you make holds meaning only by affecting your next decision.
Power is not will, it is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.
If you want to grant your own wish, then you should clear your own path to it.
It’s meaningless to just live, and it’s meaningless to just fight. I want to win.
Those who cannot acknowledge themselves, will eventually fail.

People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define ‘reality’. But what does it mean to be ‘correct’ or ‘true’? Merely vague concepts... Their ‘reality’ may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world, shaped by their beliefs?
When you give up, that’s when the game ends.
It doesn’t do any good to pretend you can’t see what’s going on.
There are no regrets. If one can be proud of one’s life, one should not wish for another chance.
It’s not always possible to do what we want to do, but it’s important to believe in something before you actually do it.
When people constantly show their affection for you, you start taking it for granted. If you don’t realize how much they care for you until they’re gone, you’ll only be left with regret and remorse.
That’s just the way it is. Change is inevitable. Instead of resisting it, you’re better served simply going with the flow.
You have to accept life as it is. Acceptance is the key for surviving the worst situations.
Life is suffering. It is hard. The world is cursed. But still you find reasons to keep living.
How can you move forward if you keep regretting the past?
Maybe there’s only a dark road up ahead. But you still have to believe and keep going. Believe that the stars will light your path, even a little bit. Come on, let’s go on a journey!
Those who stand at the top determine what's wrong and what's right! This very place is neutral ground! Justice will prevail, you say? But of course it will! Whoever wins this war becomes justice!
Whatever you lose, you’ll find it again. But what you throw away you’ll never get back.
We don’t have to know what tomorrow holds! That’s why we can live for everything we’re worth today!
If you wanna make people dream, you’ve gotta start by believing in that dream yourself!
The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.

Do not think about other things, there is only one thing you can do. So master that one thing. Do not forget. What you must imagine is always that you, yourself, are the strongest. You do not need outside enemies. For you, the one you have to fight is none other than your own image.
The only thing we’re allowed to do is believe that we won’t regret the choice we made.
I have no fear of death. It just means dreaming in silence. A dream that lasts for eternity.
You yourself have to change first, or nothing will change for you.
The strong one doesn’t win. The one who wins is strong.
It’s easier to crush a dream than realize one. Forming a bond is infinitely more difficult than breaking one.
All things change in a dynamic environment. Your effort to remain what you are is what limits you.
Don’t believe in yourself! Believe in the me who believes in you!
A different species, a different set of values, a world completely unlike your own. There is a feeling you can only get when you meet the unknown and open your mind.
I am the hope of the universe. I am the answer to all living things that cry out for peace. I am protector of the innocent. I am the light in the darkness. I am truth. Ally to good! Nightmare to you!
Don’t give up, there’s no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!
All we can do is live until the day we die. Control what we can… And fly free.
It’s just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot.
If you just submit yourself to fate, then that’s the end of it.
You can’t always hold on to the things that are important. By letting them go we gain something else.
An excellent leader must be passionate because it’s their duty to keep everyone moving forward.
Don’t be upset because of what you can’t do. Do what you do best, live as carefree and optimistically as you can, because some people aren’t able to do that.
I too will obtain everything that I desire. Not because someone asked me to do it, but because I know in my heart that I have something worth fighting for.

I think death is equally terrible for everyone. Young people, old people, the good, the bad; it’s always the same. It’s rather fair in its treatment. There’s no such thing as a particularly terrible death, that’s why it’s frightening.
Justice isn’t something that you can just proclaim. It’s a feeling you should keep near your heart.
Sometimes the things that matter the most are right in front of you.
If there is such a thing like happiness in this world, it should resemble the endless nothingness. Nihility is having nothing and having nothing to lose. If that isn’t happiness… Then what is?

In this world, there’s no such thing as 'failure' in the first place. The one who knows the 'ways to win' more than anyone is also the one who’s experienced the most 'mistakes'. In other words… You could say 'failure' is equal to 'success'… Couldn’t you?
I must study lots of things or I won’t become a great person.
The ticket to the future is always open.
Life comes at a cost. Wouldn’t it be arrogant to die before you’ve repaid that debt?

Anything can happen. No one ever thinks it will until it does. What will happen, happens. That’s how the world is. The most important thing is to not let the tragedy defeat you. To believe that you can get through it.
Just like games, no matter how well you have things lined up in your life, there’s always something to keep you on your toes.
Do exactly as you like. That is the true meaning of pleasure. Pleasure leads to joy and joy leads to happiness.
You’ll stumble many times in the future, but when you do, each time you’ll have more strength to bounce back.
Sometimes, people are just mean. Don’t fight mean with mean. Hold your head high.
anime_title: A Place Further than the Universe

quote_text: When you hit the point of no return, that’s the moment it truly becomes a journey. If you can still turn back, it’s not really a journey.
anime_title: A Place Further than the Universe

quote_text: If you can truly believe in something, then the power of your belief will make it real.

Once, I wrestled with the difficult question of how one should live as a tanuki. I felt I understood how to live an interesting life, but it was unclear what else I should do. And then somewhere along the line, idling my time away doing nothing, I realized that there’s nothing else I need to do besides live an interesting life.
Simplicity is the easiest path to true beauty.
To act is not necessarily compassion. True compassion sometimes comes from inaction.
anime_title: A Place Further than the Universe

quote_text: If you’re gonna insist on gambling and then complain when you lose, you had better work on your game.
